mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resource_file (filename, original_filename, file_path, file_size, file_type, description, download_count, uploader_id) VALUES (#{filename}, #{originalFilename}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{description}, #{downloadCount}, #{uploaderId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, filename, original_filename, file_path, file_size, file_type, description, download_count, uploader_id, create_time, update_time FROM resource_file ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT id, filename, original_filename, file_path, file_size, file_type, description, download_count, uploader_id, create_time, update_time FROM resource_file WHERE uploader_id = #{uploaderId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
